title: [1.7.10~1.12][ssp/smp]Overpowered Inventory无限物品栏(个人汉化)
author: yuge888
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuge888 于 2017-7-23 16:39 编辑 

 前言 一个辅助性的模组，装了此模组后面你会有375格物品栏并且自带一个工作台模组介绍 图片：




图片.jpg (47.61 KB, 下载次数: 517)

下载附件

2015-8-2 13:20 上传




相信大家看了这张图片就会明白一切的

具体介绍：
装备栏旁边四个物品栏分别放末影珍珠（可以放64个末影珍珠），指南针，时钟和末影箱。如果在物品栏里放了时钟和指南针的话 就会在屏幕上显示
填充旁边哪个物品栏可以放空瓶 放了空瓶点填充就可以生成一个附魔之瓶（前提是你必须有经验）
合并哪个功能经楼主测试不能用 不知道是什么原因
存入哪个功能使用方法 首先鼠标准心 对准一个箱子然后打开物品栏点存入就会把背包里的物品快速放入箱子（不过此功能有BUG可能会造成背包物品消失）
还有最后哪四个箭头是整理背包用的

详细介绍地址（为九耀龙翔搬运帖）：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-497148-1-1.html


经楼主测试2.0.0及以上版本不需要配置也能显示全部
食用方法及图（楼主以1.8.9为例）：




YY图片20160221122826.jpg (29.91 KB, 下载次数: 204)

下载附件

2016-2-21 12:42 上传





装好模组后进游戏按E键打开物品栏你会发现以上界面然后点击右上角的哪个方块就可以打开此模组的物品栏了接下来你会看到下图这个界面




2016-02-21_12.35.22.png (95.25 KB, 下载次数: 222)

下载附件

2016-2-21 12:42 上传





看见上图想必大家都明白了吧 用不着楼主多说了吧

 更新公告Now supports 1.10.2 and 1.11.2
If you have a major bug and i didnt notice it on the issue tracker or on the comments section feel free to poke me on twitter.
Version 2.0.0 is a complete rewrite and overhaul of the mod.  It is completely different.  Screenshots are mostly showing the 1.x version which is still supported and valid.  (Version 2 is just an optional upgrade.  Version 2 will only be for 1.8)
- Full compatibility with all other mods, uses a standalone inventory screen- See the screenshots for more details- IMPORTANT : If the screen is too big for your game screen, you have two options.-- change to GUI SCALE: NORMAL or bigger.  -- Go to the powerinventory.cfg and make it smaller using is_large=false- IMPORTANT : IF YOU ARE UPGRADING FROM AN OLD VERSION OF THE MOD-> Delete your configs-> EMPTY YOUR ENTIRE PLAYER INVENTORY into chests to save it.  Remember, this is 2.0 a whole remake, the old inventory is gone- Open the Overpowered Inventory with a hotkey (B) or a button that renders above your inventory- In other words, it works with baubles, custom npcs, inventory control keys, thaumcraft, balkins weapons, etc etc.- Unlock features step by step using experience points- Config control over exp costs- it has zero changes to the vanilla inventory- Still has the dual hotbars feature- Contents of the extra slots in this inventory is ignored by 'keepInventory' gamerule- No more compass, clock, uncrafting, 3x3 crafting, or exp bottles.  Some of these may return depending on user demand.  I moved the Uncrafting feature to a standalone mod "Uncrafting Grinder" and made tons of fixes and updates.- Still works with all screen resolutions, so for GUI Scale Small or Auto you can use the config file to make the screen smaller.- Please give me your bugs, features, and comments !- Added the Sort, Deposit, and Merge filter buttons into the new inventory (they work the same as in 1.x)
New stuff for 1.10.2 - 2.3.0 - Data is now stored in /saves/worldname/playerdata/_PlayerName.opi instead of just NBT data
- There is also a .opibk bakup file, replace the original with this file RIGHT AWAY if there is a problem. 
- You can also use these files to transfer items between worlds, by moving them around

Please report any bugs for the 1.10.2 version to the github issue tracker (link above). 配置文件显示不了全貌或嫌太大的小伙伴可以进行以下配置
首先找到配置文件（配置文件名称：powerinventory.cfg）
用记事本或者用UltraEdit打开 找到这一行 S:main_size=normal把等号后面的normal改成small或者large（normal对应正常 small对应小 large对应大）

此配置文件仅限于 模组版本2.0.0以下的模组使用下载链接  下载
支持原作者请点击其他 求金粒、求人气
拒绝伸手党

如果有新版本我会第一时间更新的！
还有就是因为此模组比较新所以会有BUG！
